DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History History of Peripheral Vascular Disease Flag java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced._An event in the personal medical history of peripheral vascular disease as evidenced by: 1. Claudication either with exertion or at rest; 2. Amputation for arterial vascular insufficiency; 3. Aorto-iliac occlusive disease reconstruction, peripheral vascular bypass surgery, angioplasty or stent; or percutaneous intervention to the extremities; 4. Documented abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) repair or stent; 5. Positive non-invasive/invasive test. It does not include procedures such as vein stripping, carotid disease, or procedures originating above the diaphragm. (from NIH Roadmap Cardiovascular Data Standards Working Group):An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

It does not include procedures such as vein stripping, carotid disease, or procedures originating above the diaphragm. Amputation for arterial vascular insufficiency; 3. ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
